text: @IPreferPi314 @douglasritz @EricTopol And I doubt most of us are ready for the rate of death that would accompany that rate of exposure (3.7 million dead assuming a 1.4% death rate and 80% of US population exposed  [330 million x 80% x 1.4%] exposure)(is my math right?).
